choices: They start asking her uncomfortable questions.
The kids start pulling pranks on her.
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
Amelia walks into her next classroom, but, she was hearing more noise than usual. "You can do this, Amelia. Maybe you'll need a little more discipline with this group." She thought.

As she steps in, she is greeted by the students, however, she notices the voices sounded younger, she turns around to face them and realizes she was in a 4th grade class.

"Oh, I'm sorry. I must have made a mistake." She walks away, giggles and laughs from the kids caused her to blush. She goes to the hallway and checks her schedule, turns out that was her next group. She was bothered by this and decided to talk with the principal.

"Hi, Amelia." Mr. Peters was leaving his office. "What can I do for you?"

"Hi, I want to ask why am I in an elementary class?"

"Really? Let me see that." He reads the schedule. "There must be a mix up between teachers. I'll check it later."

"And what should I do?"

"I'm sorry, Amelia. But I'm afraid that you'll have to teach those kids until I found out what happened." He replies.

Amelia was annoyed, but she thanked him and walked back to the classroom.

"So, you weren't lost?" A kid asks, causing more laughter towards her.

"Apparently not." She says. "Now keep quiet." She writes her name on the board. "My name is Mrs. Thatch and I'll be your temporary math teacher." She says. "Any questions?"

The kids didn't reply, so she thought that maybe she was having this group under control, however....
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: There was a mix up, she's got a 4th grade m...

choices: She has to escort the 4th graders to their next class
They ask her a few more questions
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
As she went through the math lesson, she heard some whispers and giggling as she wrote on the board or whenever she was helpin a student. She could only take so much before she sighed and asked the class, "Alright, what's with all the giggling?" She put her hand on her hips, "Come on! Tell me."

A blonde boy in the back, Nathan, according to the name card on his desk, raised his hand.

"Yes?" Amelia sighed.

"Umm, we were wonderin' why your boobies and bum are so pale." He said quickly, before looking a good bit embarrassed at having been the one to speak up.

Amelia blushed at the question, before sighing and realized that for most of the kids here, they might never have seen a tan line before, much less any clothing. "Well," she started, "I didn't always live here at Bareside. I lived in a different town where we have to wear clothes." So far so good, the kids all looked at each other in silence, trying to figure out why people would wear clothes all the time. "And whenever I went to the beach or the pool, I'd wear a swimsuit, and when I tanned, the parts of me under the swimsuits wouldn't tan, leaving these pale spots. They're called 'tan lines'." Amelia was glad that they'd disappear on their own in another week or two.

The kids all nodded, and thankfully with their curiosity sated, she could get them all back to the art lesson at hand. For now...
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: They start asking her uncomfortable questions.

1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
After Amelia finishes explaining the topic of today, the bell rings, meaning that the class was over.

"Okay, class. Try to solve this problem and we'll check it tomorrow." She picks up her books and notices that the kids were staring at her, confused.

"What? Is something wrong?"

"Mrs. Thatch." A girl called Lilly raises her hand. "We have swimming class next, but we need a teacher to take us there."

Amelia sees her watch and realizes her next class would be in two hours. "I see, well then, prepare everything you need and I'll wait for you outside." The kids nodded and started to move.

In the hallways, some of the kids talked with Amelia and asked her about clothes and other stuff. After they arrived to the pool, the group thanked her and ran to the locker rooms. Amelia smiled, realizing that, at the very least, these 4th graders seemed to be nice.

"Here you are." She turns around to see Mr. Peters. "I was looking for you. Listen, Amelia, we had a few problems with the schedules and if you are okay with it, we can change you this group."

"Actually, I would like to keep teaching this group if you don't mind." She replies. "They are good kids."

"I'm glad to hear that." He recovers his breath. "Because apparently, a couple of teachers are retiring, and I want to propose you something, obviously with a deserved raise in your payment."

"And what is that?"

"It's about those 4th graders, they need a new...
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: She has to escort the 4th graders to their next...

choices: Julie's first day at the BEC
Amelia heads to the teachers lounge for a snack, and meets more coworkers
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
Amelia thought about it for a moment, "What does a home room teacher do?" She didn't want a new position that would be too inconvenient.

Mr. Peters answered calmly, "Nothing too bad, you're the first and last teacher these kids will see." He began counting off the responsibilities on his fingers, "You take their attendance in the morning, sometimes you'll have a mini-lesson to give them, like organizing their lockers or writing in cursive. Then you'll take them to their first class and you'll teach your classes until the end of the day, when they come back to you and you'll make sure they've got everything before escorting them to the buses."

Amelia nodded along, it did seem like a good position, with a pay raise too, and at least this group seemed to be well behaved. "Mr. Peters, I'll take it." She said reaching her hand out for a handshake.

Mr. Peters smiled and shook it, "Good. Their homeroom is F113, so head over and get yourself acquainted with your new office. They'll be seeing you again at the end of the day."

Amelia nodded and headed off, eventually finding the right hall and walking down it, the cartoonish decorations on the doors and walls taking her back to her own childhood. She did find F113 quickly though, and the room was a bit messy, having a bunch of 4th graders together will do that, but it was doable, and she had a very large desk now too. She sat down in the chair to get a feel for it, finding it extremely comfortable.
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: Homeroom teacher."

1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
After discussing with her sister, Julie walks into the education center.

"Stupid Amelia." Julie mumbles. "She doesn't get it."

"Hey." Lauren meets her. "What happened to you yesterday?"

"Nothing, my dumb sister thought I needed a break and told me to stay home." The blonde girl crosses her arms. "I'm sorry for letting you guys down."

"Don't sweat it. Gary and I spent the day playing board games." She smiles. "He even told me that he'll start working out."

"Good news for you, isn't it?" Julie says with a sad tone.

"What's the matter?" Lauren asks.

"I had a fight with Amelia." Julie sighs. "She's mad at me because I threw our clothes to the trash."

Lauren giggles. "Why did you do it?"

"I don't know, first, I was afraid of nudists and being one and suddenly, I hate clothes and can't even look at them." Julie walks around in circles. "I don't even know what I want."

Lauren thinks about it. "Just chill, I know you got used to this, but you didn't need to take it that far."

"Easy for you to say. You never leave this town."

"Who says I don't? I sometimes go outside of Bareside with my parents and my little sister, even with Melissa and Debbie." She replies.

"I'm sorry, Lauren. I should stop thinking about this." She deeply breathes. "There. Oh, can you help me to get to my classroom?" The goth girl nods and both walk in the hallway.

"Why don't you make up with Amelia? I mean, maybe you feel guilty and that's why your mind is a mess."

Julie shakes her head. "I'll apologize on the way back home, besides, she's probably busy with her first group."
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: Julie's first day at the BEC

choices: She accidentally wacks someone with her racket during the game
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
Julie did feel a little odd walking down the hall wearing nothing but her sneakers and a backpack, but her remaining fear of all things clothes negated that a good deal. Her first class was actually gym class, and she was surprised that they still had locker rooms for the boys and girls. Though instead of having everyone change into a uniform, once everyone had tossed their stuff into the lockers, class started.

And that's where Julie's status as the 'new girl' became very obvious. Aside from her tan lines, she found herself staring at both her male and female classmates as they played basketball or, as Julie chose, badminton. And that was something that made her stand out a good deal, as she'd get distracted by a classmates chest or ... dangly bits ... moving around and she'd loose focus in the moment.

"Gotta work on your concentration Thatch!" The gym coach called out, his voice booming across the gym, making Julie blush as she tried to focus on the badminton game, and not on her classmate's bodies.
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: Julie's first class.

choices: Not really, it's more complicated than that."
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
The game continues as Julie is about to serve. "Focus, Julie. If you mess this one, you won't fit anywhere." She inhales and serves the birdie, hoping this would be the last time.

"I'm telling you, I have the biggest one." She hears the voice coming from a group of boys.

"In your dreams, Zach. Take a look at this one."

This was enough to distract Julie, but she could only see their backs.

"Thatch! Eyes on the court!" The coach calls her again.

As she focuses, the other team hit a clear high, scoring. This was bothering Julie, as she serves again.

"You are making me laugh with those sticks." Another boy says. "How about we put them on the floor to compare sizes."

The blonde teenager moves her sight towards the group again. "Thatch!" However, Julie didn't pay attention and thought that swinging her racket hard was enough.

"Godammit Thatch!" The coach runs and takes her racket. "What is wrong with you?"

Julie was confused, until she saw the girl from her team on the floor, rubbing her head. "I'm sorry, it wasn't my intention." She turns to the group of boys, but now they were looking at her, each one holding baseball bats.

"Yeah, I saw it." The coach says. "Hart, are you okay?"

The girl nods. "I'm fine, just please stop staring at me." She tries to not cover herself.

"You got a good hit on the head, better go check it. Thatch, you are taking her to the nurse's office." The coach instructs.

"Yes, sir."

"And I'm warning you, you better solve those issues you have, because if this happens again. You'll be visiting the principal's office in no time."

Julie nodded and sighed. What a way to start her first day at school. She walks in the halls next to the girl she hit.

"Look, I'm deeply sorry." She apologizes.

"Don't worry, accidents happen."

"I know this isn't the best time, but, I'm Julie." She extends her hand.

"I'm Samantha."

"So, Samantha, are you new here, too?"

"Why do you ask?"

"Because I saw you blushing when you got everybody's attention."

Samantha sighs. "Well....
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: She accidentally wacks someone with her racket ...

choices: Julie and warren in the next class
Julie and Lauren (and her friends) in the next class
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
"Oh?" Julie asked, looking at Samantha.

"Yeah." Samantha said, looking down at her feet, "Well," she stammered, "it's not so much complicated, as I hate being the center of attention."

Julie nodded, she'd known a few classmates like this, just wanting to stay in the background and stay unnoticed. "Ah, gotcha." She said, "Hey? Wanna hang out later? I'll treat?"

Samantha shook her head, "No thanks, I'd rather just go home, I just don't care much for socializing."

Julie nodded and accepted her classmate's decision, thankfully the rest of the walk to the nurse's office passed by in uneventful silence. The nurse gave Samantha a clean bill of health, and an ice pack for the bump on her head, before sending the two girls back.

Julie was thankful that they were able to get back to class before it ended, and the teacher had her sit out the rest of gym as punishment, while Samantha took out a book and started reading.
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: Not really, it's more complicated than that...

choices: the Biology teacher. You'll see why I'm complaining."
the visual arts teacher. He always picks couples to pose."
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
Walking into the next classroom, Julie was surprised to see a familiar face.

"Hi, Julie." Warren greets her.

"Hi, why you didn't tell me we have a class together?" She sits on the chair next to him.

"I didn't know." Warren replies. "Apparently, the school has some problems with the teachers and they are mixing groups, Derek and Will are having math. How it was your first class?"

"It was a mess." Julie admits, telling him about gym class, except for the reason why she was getting distracted. "Sorry about yesterday." She remembers about cancelling their date.

"Don't mention it, we simply postponed it, right?" He yawns. "I'm still tired from seeing that marathon last night."

"You saw those movies too?" Julie asks.

"Yeah, some were cheesy but entertaining." He discusses with Julie about their favorite moments of the marathon, until the teacher appeared.

"Okay, everybody take a seat."

Warren groans and Julie notices it. "What's wrong?"

"We got Mr. Louis." He sighs. "He is.....
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: Julie and Warren in the next class

1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
Julie raised an eyebrow but remained silent as Mr Louis typed away at his computer, Julie wasn't sure why having this teacher was such a bad thing, he didn't seem terribly aggressive or demanding, but then again, class just started.

"Alright class," he said calmly, "today we're going to go over the basic systems that every species has." He pulled up a slide detailing them, "We'll start with the brain and nervous system, then move on through them to my favorite, the digestive system."

The class groaned as he began his lecture. And Julie learned very quickly why everyone hated him, he didn't use the diagrams in the textbook, he used pictures taken from research facilities! Julie fought back her gag reflex as she looked at various internal organs, everyone else seemed desensitized to it, and she tried not to focus on it too much, but it was just so disgusting!

"How can he do this?" She whispered to Warren.

"He uses authorized pictures from official research labs, and purely for educational purposes. Some legal reasons too as to why no one can't stop him, but this, thankfully, is a strong bad as he gets." He whispered back.

Julie nodded and tried to keep her breakfast down as the lecture continued.
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.title: the Biology teacher. You'll see why I'm...

choices: Helping to carry books back to the library.
A teacher needs a hand for her class.
1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
"If I'm facing this, I can't imagine what is happening to Amelia." Julie thought.

Meanwhile, Amelia was resting in her new desk, then, somebody knocks at the door of the classroom.

"I see you are enjoying your first day here." James walks in.

"Kind of. This is happening so fast, I can't believe it." She replies.

"Yeah, Mr. Peters was looking for a homeroom teacher for these kids and you were the only good choice."

"So, you told him to offer me the group? Thanks, James." She gets up and hugs him. "How can I ever repay you?"

"It's nothing, dear." He smiles. "After I met you and how Carol talks about you, I knew you would be the best person to do this job."

"I insist, if there's anything I could you, just tell me."

"Well, there's one thing, you are not busy right now, are you?"

Amelia shakes her head. "Not at all, I still have plenty of time. What do you need?"

1553121.content:
Currently, at home alone in her New York City penthouse, Emma Ross is laying on her bed in her bedroom wearing a pair of bedazzled blue jeans, a silk t-shirt, and barefoot.

Having just finished texting her friend Rosie, Emma decides that she would like to take a relaxing and luxurious bath so feeling grateful that she won't have to worry about being interrupted by either her brothers Luke and or Ravi, her sister Zuri or butler Bertram
due to the rest of her family and Bertram being on vacation, Emma stands up, and
quickly pushes her bedazzled jeans down her legs, and over her bare feet, before stepping out of them altogether, and tossing them into her nearby hamper leaving herself wearing just her fancy silk shirt and surprisingly a pair of boxers.

Granted, they're expensive designer boxers but to anyone who knows Emma well, it would be quite surprising to discover that she prefers to wear boxers more often than panties.

Heck, Emma can't help but grin upon having that thought as she imagines most people who know her assume that she wears lacy panties or even thongs though she does hope that people aren't thinking of her in her underwear or naked all too often.

Not wanting to waste any more time Emma grabs the bottom of her silk t-shirt with both hands, pulls it up her torso, over her head and tosses it into the hamper with her previously discarded jeans which leaves her standing in the middle of her bedroom wearing just her boxers due to the fact that she had not been wearing a bra as she did not see the point since she was going to have the penthouse to herself for the next few weeks.

Wearing nothing but her boxers now, Emma pauses to admire herself in her full-length wall mounted mirror and can't help but smile and say out loud :

I am really looking good. Although I could use a good tan.

Moments later, after admiring herself for a few more seconds Emma grabs the waistband of her boxers, pushes them down her legs, over her bare feet, steps out of them altogether and tosses them into the hamper with her previously discarded shirt and pants which leaves her standing in the middle of her bedroom completely naked and barefoot.

Deciding that she should go ahead and empty her hamper down the laundry chute Emma walks over to her hamper, picks it up, and carries it a few feet over to the laundry chute leading to the downstairs laundry room and empties the entire hamper down the chute.

Having taken care of that, Emma puts the hamper back in the nearby corner and heads into her bathroom to begin her relaxing and luxurious bath.

info.brief_description: This website has plenty of ENF, so why not?
info.description:
Greetings and all that, potential writers.
Inspired by a couple stories from CHYOA, this story will take the E out of ENF and replace it with a C. For confidence.

Basically, it’s the same as an ENF story in which a girl loses her clothes in a public place. However, instead of being embarrassed, the girl decides to roll with it and “own” her nudity.
